definition: huge/great/grand/worthy of the greatest admiration/important (contribution etc)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The educational aim of Huijia School is to "be a great Chinese".
sentences.chinese: 匯佳學校的培養目標是“做一個偉大的中國人”。

sentences.english: Rachel has some great ideas for packing and organizing kids stuff for a trip.
sentences.chinese: 雷切爾在關於給孩子旅行裝包方面有着很偉大的點子。

sentences.english: The role of lead car has been rotated which is great and a bit of fun.
sentences.chinese: 領隊的車已被旋轉的作用是一個偉大的一點樂趣。

sentences.english: I want to be a great scientist like Yuan Longping.
sentences.chinese: 想成爲像袁隆平那樣偉大的科學家。

sentences.english: We rank Li Siguang as a great scientist.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲李四光是個偉大的科學家。

sentences.english: A great singer is he who sings our silences .
sentences.chinese: 偉大的歌者能唱出我們的沉默。

sentences.english: Tori Ritchie says it's great year-round, and for fish and veggies, too.
sentences.chinese: 託麗裏奇說，他是偉大的全年性，爲魚類和蔬菜，太。

sentences.english: This is a great success in the front of politics and ideology of our party and our country.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們黨和國家在思想政治戰線上的一個偉大勝利。

sentences.english: What one person considers great design could be hated by another.
sentences.chinese: 一個人認爲偉大的設計可能是另一個人討厭的。

sentences.english: He produced bulldogs that was great producers and match dogs.
sentences.chinese: 他製作的牛頭犬隊的比賽是偉大的生產者和狗。

sentences.english: Or laid great bases for eternity.
sentences.chinese: 或奠下偉大基礎，要留芳萬代。

sentences.english: "United are still one of the best clubs in the world, " Cantona said.
sentences.chinese: 坎通納認爲曼聯仍然是這世界上最偉大的俱樂部之一。

sentences.english: Simaqian is one of the greatest historiographers who has spiritual freedom .
sentences.chinese: 司馬遷是一個具有自由精神的偉大的歷史學家。

sentences.english: The great friendship and militant solidarity between the peoples of our two countries are unbreakable.
sentences.chinese: 我們兩國人民的偉大友誼與戰鬥團結是堅不可摧的。

sentences.english: Grubby - A great player who got great skills in wc3.
sentences.chinese: 一個有着偉大的魔獸技藝的偉大選手。

sentences.english: Grubby - A great player who got great skills in wc3.
sentences.chinese: 一個有着偉大的魔獸技藝的偉大選手。

definition: to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
